section.title: Bean
section.para: Create an instance of MyBean using its default constructor.

section.title: Constructor
section.para: Create an instance of MyBean using its String constructor.
Create an instance of MyBean selecting its String constructor.
Create an instance of MyBean selecting its String constructor and passing in null.
Create an instance of MyBean using a static method on a factory passing in a String.
Create an instance of MyBean using a method on a factory instance passing in a String.
section.programlisting:
<deployment> <bean name="MyBeanFactory" class="com.mypackage.MyBeanFactory"/>
<bean name="MyBean" interface="com.mypackage.MyInterface"> <constructor factoryMethod="create"> <parameter class="java.lang.String">MyString</parameter> <factory bean="MyBeanFactory"/> </constructor> </bean> </deployment>

section.title: Property
section.para: Setting a list property on MyBean
Setting a set property on MyBean
Setting a map property on MyBean
section.programlisting: <deployment> <bean name="MyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyBean"> <property name="MyMapProperty"> <map class="java.util.HashMap" keyClass="java.lang.String" valueClass="java.lang.String"> <entry> <key>MyKey1</key> <value>MyString1</value> </entry> <entry> <key>MyKey2</key> <value>MyString2</value> </entry> </map> </property> </bean> </deployment>

<deployment> <bean name="MyPropertyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyPropertyBean">
<bean name="MyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyBean"> <property name="MyProperty"><inject bean="MyPropertyBean"/></property> </bean> </deployment>

<deployment> <bean name="MyPropertyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyPropertyBean">
<bean name="MyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyBean"> <property name="MyProperty"><inject bean="MyPropertyBean" property="Property"/></property> </bean> </deployment>

section.title: Depends
section.para: Create an explicit dependency on MyDependency.

section.title: Install / Uninstall
section.para: Specify an install and an uninstall method for MyBean.

section.title: Incallback / Uncallback
section.para: Call addPropertyBean and removePropertyBean on PropertyBeans during install / uninstall of MyPropertyBean.
section.programlisting:
<deployment> <bean name="MyPropertyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyPropertyBean"/>
<bean name="PropertyBeans" class="com.mypackage.PropertyBeans"> <incallback method="addPropertyBean"/> <uncallback method="removePropertyBean"/> </bean> </deployment>

section.title: Create / Start / Stop / Destroy
section.para: Specify the names of the create, start, stop and destroy methods on MyBean.
section.programlisting: <deployment> <bean name="MyBean" class="com.mypackage.MyBean"> <create method="myCreate"/> <start method="myStart"/> <stop method="myStop"/> <destroy method="myDestroy"/> </bean> </deployment>

section.title: IgnoreCreate / IgnoreStart / IgnoreStop / IgnoreDestroy
section.para: Ignore the create, start, stop and destroy methods on MyBean.
